name: RadioMv(German)
0: ”Alexa, play Radio M. V. German Station”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio m. v. german station
des:
RadioMv is a Online Christian Radio Network. Hundreds of Slavic, Spanish, German and American s are listening RadioMv around the world. Since it's launch in February 2006 the program has been played in more than 136 countries of the world. "You give them something to eat." ~ Luke 9: 13

Here are the available German stations that you could choose from:
- Main Station
- New Testament Station
- Old Testament Station

RadioMv also streams in English, Spanish and Slavic language. Just say:
- "Alexa, play RadioMv English Station" for English
- "Alexa, play RadioMv Spanish Station" for Spanish
- "Alexa, play RadioMv Slavic Station" for Slavic

..or search in your Alexa App the keywords:
"RadioMv English"
"RadioMv Spanish"
"RadioMv Slavic"

DISCLAIMER: The skill content is in German Language.
